statements: SELECT * FROM product_returns WHERE return_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM product_returns WHERE return_date > '2021-12-01' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE exchange_id IS NULL;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_returns WHERE return_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE exchange_id IS NULL ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT return_id, product_id, exchange_id FROM product_returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM product_returns WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM product_returns ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, return_date FROM returns WHERE return_reason = 'Defective';
SELECT * FROM exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date DESC;
SELECT exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_reason = 'Wrong Size' ORDER BY return_date;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returns ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_reason LIKE 'damaged%'
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_date FROM exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, exchange_date, exchange_reason FROM exchanges WHERE exchange_reason = 'wrong size'
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT return_date, reason FROM Returns WHERE return_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, product_id, return_date FROM Returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Exchanges WHERE reason = 'defective' AND exchanged_product_id = 2;
SELECT exchange_date, original_product_id FROM Exchanges WHERE exchange_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Returns WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, product_id, reason FROM Returns WHERE return_date > '2021-01-01' AND reason LIKE '%damaged%';
SELECT rp.return_type, rp.pattern_id, rp.pattern_description, r.product_id FROM ReturnPatterns rp LEFT JOIN Returns r ON rp.pattern_id = r.return_id WHERE rp.return_type = 'Refund';

SELECT e.exchange_date, e.original_product_id, e.exchanged_product_id, r.return_date, r.product_id FROM Exchanges e JOIN Returns r ON e.original_product_id = r.product_id WHERE e.exchange_date > r.return_date;
SELECT exchange_id, original_product_id, exchanged_product_id, reason FROM Exchanges ORDER BY exchange_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Example Manufacturer' OR manufacturer = 'Another Manufacturer';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM returns JOIN products ON returns.product_id = products.product_id WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM product_returns;
SELECT product_id, return_reason FROM product_returns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT return_id, return_reason, return_date FROM product_returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, return_reason, return_count FROM return_patterns WHERE return_count > 5;
SELECT exchange_id, product_id, new_product_id, exchange_reason, exchange_date FROM product_exchanges WHERE exchange_date < '2022-04-01';
SELECT * FROM return_patterns WHERE return_count > 10;
SELECT product_id, return_reason, return_date FROM product_returns ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT exchange_reason, exchange_count FROM exchange_patterns WHERE exchange_count < 5 ORDER BY exchange_count ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM return_patterns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damage%';

SELECT product_returns.product_id, product_exchanges.new_product_id, return_reason, exchange_reason FROM product_returns JOIN product_exchanges ON product_returns.product_id = product_exchanges.product_id;
